import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:8080/";var getAllRestaurant=function getAllRestaurant(){return axios.get(API_URL+"restaurants");};var getAllRestaurantName=function getAllRestaurantName(){return axios.get(API_URL+"restaurants/names");};var getRestaurantContent=function getRestaurantContent(name){return axios.get(API_URL+"restaurants/name?name=".concat(name));};var updateRestaurant=function updateRestaurant(content){return axios.post(API_URL+"updateRestaurant",content).then(function(response){return response.data;});};// eslint-disable-next-line
export default{getAllRestaurant:getAllRestaurant,getAllRestaurantName:getAllRestaurantName,getRestaurantContent:getRestaurantContent,updateRestaurant:updateRestaurant};
